room_title: Escape room "Haunted Pirate Shipwreck" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: THIS IS SO MUCH FUN! If you have not done an escape room, which I had never done, it's a blast. I got locked in a themed Haunted Pirate Shipwreck room for 60 minutes with my family and friends searching for a treasure and to escape. Amazing immersion makes you feel like you are in another world, challenging puzzles to solve, and you HAVE to work together! Truly an experience like no other. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Pirate Shipwreck" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: Haunted Pirate Shipwreck: quality hi-tech puzzle design and gorgeous sets. The best escape room we have ever played!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Pirate Shipwreck" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: The best one in Florida! Detailed rooms, interesting puzzles and effects! Pirate room is awesome!
